VBA toolbox
Install Wiki About

The Bayesian Toolbox

The modeling solution for the experimentalist

Simulate and predict

Deal with static, dynamic, and stochastic models

Easily develop your own model or pick up one from the library

Estimate and diagnose

Find the best parameters using the variational bayes algorithm

Analyse model fit with included tools

Compare and select

Perform statistical test on multiple hypotheses

Within and between groups, condition effects, etc.

Participate to the VBA-toolbox!

  • post a request
